short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One-stop public infrastructure reporting platform, from airports to water systems

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using the eyes, ears, and intuition of everyday users (i.e., motorists, commuters, residents, businesses), InfraInput turns private testimonies of infrastructure issues into public entries for the geographic-specific, detailed attention of policymakers and public managers. 

With easy web input and csv/pdf output, such issues may include poor pavements, school mold infestation, leaning utility poles, aging rail stations, broken water mains, and other items in people's everyday walks of life. All this in the sole effort to turn the tide of neglect to America's aging, overused, and abandoned public infrastructure.
